channel.title: Friend server
channel.description:
Hello!
i downloaded a server and a client now i want to make a server only for me friends, first i used hamachi but i dont like that much so i looked around and now i can change the server ip of the client by Gui.java or something, do some1 know how i need to do this with me server cuz i think you need to change that too?
Please help!

item.title: Friend server
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

No portforwarding questions, sorry.

www.portforward.com

Read full topic

item.title: Friend server
item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost
item.description:
@freakinlost wrote:

the kind of routers dont matter unless your running linksys anyways yes in order for someone to connect to your server you do need to portforward just dont post on any server status and only give your friends a client then you only play with friends and you do need no-ip for soemone to connect

Read full topic

item.title: Friend server
item.dc:creator: @Pixel_Cookies Pixel_Cookies
item.description:
@Pixel_Cookies wrote:

Some useful tips;

1.) Skip to the ‘No-Ip’ in the server-setup tutorial (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html)
2.) Once an No-Ip adress made, change the Gui.java to your No-Ip adress (make sure its online when you portforwarded your router and that you downloaded the No-Ip software)

Read full topic

What kind of router do you have?

item.title: Friend server
item.dc:creator: @abcpker711 abcpker711
item.description:
@abcpker711 wrote:

Unless there at your house then yes, you must portforward, because all in all, if they want to play, from their house that is, it has to be “Connected to the internet…”

Read full topic

item.title: Friend server
item.dc:creator: @Diary_Of_Zon Diary Of Zon
item.description:
@Diary_Of_Zon wrote:

I need to do portforwarding first? also if i only want to play with me friends?

Read full topic

item.title: Friend server
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

^^^^^ Portfoward.
Then search for 127.0.0.1 or “localhost” in Gui.txt
Replace that with your IP
www.whatsmyip.org

Read full topic

item.title: Friend server
item.dc:creator: @abcpker711 abcpker711
item.description:
@abcpker711 wrote:

Well, I could probly help you code that out, but I’m not even going to bother if you don’t have your portforwarding done mate. =\

Read full topic
